name: Simple Polyomino Puzzle
description:
Input:

  • <W>, <Up Arrow> to rotate
  • <A>, <D>, <Left Arrow>, <Right Arrow> to move horizontal
  • <S>, <Down Arrow> to move down
  • <Space>, <Enter> to instant drop
  • <Enter> to start or restart

Additional:

  • You can buy source code to make your own polyomino game easily by clicking here.
